title: debian pkg: lintian reports issues with manpages

labels.name: severity-minor
labels.description: a problem which doesn't affect the package's usefulness, and is presumably trivial to fix

body:
```
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/datalad-add-archive-content.1.gz
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/datalad-add-readme.1.gz
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry usr/share/man/man1/datalad-add.1.gz
W: datalad: manpage-has-bad-whatis-entry ... use --no-tag-display-limit to see all (or pipe to a file/program)
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/datalad-aggregate-metadata.1.gz 35: warning: macro 'datalad.metadata.nativetype'' not defined (possibly missing space after 'da')
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/datalad-clone.1.gz 27: warning: macro '.git'' not defined
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man usr/share/man/man1/datalad-run-procedure.1.gz 40: a special character is not allowed in a name
W: datalad: manpage-has-errors-from-man ... use --no-tag-display-limit to see all (or pipe to a file/program)
```
